input.sentences: after riding the carnival rides all morning the family decides to take a break .
they buy some toys for their kids and then decide that it is time to eat .
they choose the open kitchen because the mascot is so cute .
the meals for the kids are family friendly and delicious .
but mom orders a fancy dessert for herself . it is the perfect end to the perfect meal .
output.sentences: It was a nice morning for a ride.
The kids enjoy playing with their toys.
Mom enjoys time in the kitchen with the kids.
She loves to prepare healthy meals for them to enjoy.
The all agree it was a perfect meal.
